trends: There have been no other sightings in Green Forest
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: it looked like a star at first but then when it moved it would luminate multiple colors and sent off multiple red glowing abjects
divs: Sighting Detailswell I was laying in bed, about to go to sleep when the star I was staring at starting to move and put off other like. such as, red, blue, and green. By this time I thought it was a plane. but then it started moving unlike any aircraft I have ever seen. it started moving at insane speeds. it also took turn that no plane shound be able to do. it flow in zig zag pattarn for a while. then a red abject come out of no where! and it came up and an even more incredible speed. it hoverd about the biger original ship.then disappeared. then reappeared and took off again in the opsite direction it came.and past another just like it on the way away from the original ship. and more redish smaler ships came and kept just going back and forth from the "mother ship" untill it moved to far about to see.
